original_text: Only the people sacrificed in high places, because there was no house built unto the name of the Lord, until those days.
korean_text: 그 때까지 여호와의 이름을 위하여 성전을 아직 건축하지 아니하였으므로 백성들이 산당에서 제사하며

sentences.original_text: Only the people sacrificed in high places,
because there was no house built
unto the name of the Lord,
